overview:
Since 1996, Jeff Coe has been involved in shaping the new media and digital industry on an international level. He has gained experience in highly competitive, fast-paced working environments that have spanned from smaller privately held start-ups, to companies that have matured into mid-sized public firms. Jeff has been responsible for licensing content from all the major Music, TV and Film Studios Globally for new digital media platforms, and has co created new business models with multiple top 500 all the way from the USA to Asia.

Clicking up more Frequent Flyer points than most pilots, Jeff has been responsible for rolling out multiple wireless and online initiatives within content delivery and community applications globally. This has given him the perspective from not only the IP owners, but also the distributors of the content and the end users in diverse markets spanning the globe so that he has a better understanding of the challenges these unique cultural barriers represent.
